channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Blog Post 2
item.description: Welcome to my 2022 Midterm blog series. I’m Kaela Ellis, a junior at Harvard College studying Government. This semester I am taking Gov 1347: Election Analytics taught by Professor Ryan Enos, which has led to the creation of this blog. I will use this blog series to predict the 2022 Midterm election. The series will be updated weekly with new predictive measures and analyses of past elections. ##Introduction This second blog post examines the question of the effect of fundamentals in House elections.

item.title: Blog Post 1
item.description: Welcome to my 2022 Midterm blog series. I’m Kaela Ellis, a junior at Harvard College studying Government. This semester I am taking Gov 1347: Election Analytics taught by Professor Ryan Enos, which has led to the creation of this blog. I will use this blog series to predict the 2022 Midterm election. The series will be updated weekly with new predictive measures and analyses of past elections. ##Introduction This first blog post examines the question of gerrymandering in the 2020 House election.
